# Changelog

## 1.2.2 (2025-10-02)

## 1.2.1 (2025-06-13)
* Fix suggested prototypes ([MGNLCLI-393](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-393))

## 1.2.0 (2025-06-06)
* Make componentsSpaPath and pagesSpaPath global properties ([MGNLCLI-384](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-384))

## 1.1.0 (2025-04-29)
* Enforce camelCase for light modules and PascalCase for SPA templates ([MGNLCLI-358](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-358))
* Make the name parameter optional ([MGNLCLI-372](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-372))

## 1.0.2 (2025-03-17)
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))

## 1.0.1 (2025-02-06)
* Configure ESLint and prettier ([MGNLCLI-258](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-258))
* Add confirm prompt of framework package download ([MGNLCLI-269](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-269))
* Add depcheck to husky ([MGNLCLI-289](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-289))
* Move test-helper.js functionality to cli-helper ([MGNLCLI-307](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-307))

## 1.0.0 (2024-10-14)
* introduce `@magnolia/cli-create-page-plugin` package
